title: Bazerka is the hero we need, but not one we deserve...
body:
Riot Bazerka has been replying even to posts on the "recent" / "new" pages. They're taking the time to check the boards frequently and they're looking at more than just the "hot" tab.

If you see this Bazerka please know that you are appreciated. It goes a long way to see a Red taking the effort to look at more than just the "hot" page, and your efforts will not go unnoticed. Please keep it up and don't let haters dissuade you from engaging with the rest of us about stuff.

replies.body: He's looking like a guy from Riot who comes to boards just because he enjoys reading and engaging positive users. Everyone should be aware that there is no official demand for clarifying stuff like balance or else. We welcome him and have fun together but we should not treat him like a someone being in charge of communication. Does that make sense?

> [{quoted}](name=InTheory,realm=EUW,application-id=6heBIhQc,discussion-id=kw6e7EEv,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-06-12T18:23:59.133+0000)
>
> He's looking like a guy from Riot who comes to boards just because he enjoys reading and engaging positive users. Everyone should be aware that there is no official demand for clarifying stuff like balance or else. We welcome him and have fun together but we should not treat him like a someone being in charge of communication. Does that make sense?

Not to be combative, but its actually quite the opposite. Once upon a time I was a hyper frustrated player on these forums, but a empathetic & listening Rioter tuned in one day and made a world of difference. Last week I was reading through some board posts and realized there wasn't that voice now a days. Hence me posting a crap ton :). 

Im not perfect, and will mis-speak. But if I can help I'm here. Even if it means people yelling at me, but they feel like they are heard.
Yes that makes lots of sense! And I agree with you. I'm just trying to show appreciation for what they're doing.
